titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on d-6-Methoxy-a-methyl-2-naphthaleneacetic acid and its sodium salt.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duty on d-6-Methoxy-a-methyl-2-naphthaleneacetic acid and its sodium salt.
